sentence.Network_cn: 经济危机周期性地发生.

sentence.Network_en: The same old favorites recur year in year out with monotonous regularity.
sentence.Network_cn: 相同的决心以单调的规律年复一年地出现.

sentence.Network_en: He did not recur in thought to New York or the flat.
sentence.Network_cn: 他再也没去想纽约或者他的公寓.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 考博英语词汇 ... recumbent a. 躺着的；斜靠的 recur v. 复发；再发 reel n. 卷轴，卷筒；卷盘，一盘.
英语词根词缀记忆大全 ... occurrence v 出现，产生 recur a 再发生，重现 recurrent a 一再发生的.
英语词根词缀记忆大全 ... occurrence v 出现，产生 recur a 再发生，重现 recurrent a 一再发生的.
重字的解释---在线新华字典 ... 重修旧好〖 renewcordialrelations〗 重演〖 recur〗 重眼皮，重眼皮儿〖 double-foldeyelid〗.

list.abs: 审计英语词汇 - 豆丁网 ... audit engagement letter 业务约定书 15. recurring audit 连续审计 16. the client 委托人 17.
财务英语英汉对照表 (R) - MBA智库百科 ... recurring audit 经常性审计 recurring costs 经常性成本 red balance 赤字余额.
，以及可重复增加的收入（recurring revenue）。这意味着你要放弃那些需要12个月的时间来完成定单1亿5千万辆汽车。
recurring continued fraction 循环连分数recurring series 循环级数recursion 递归

derivation.yuyuan_name: Middle English (in the sense 'return to'): from Latin recurrere, from re- 'again, back' + currere 'run'

entry.def: If something recurs, it happens more than once.

example.ex: ...a theme that was to recur frequently in his work.
example.tran: 一个在他的作品中反复出现的主题

example.ex: ...a recurring nightmare she has had since childhood.
example.tran: 一个从她童年起就不断出现的噩梦

means.word_mean: 2. return in thought or speech to something

auth_sentence.content: I must recur to the great subject of food.
auth_sentence.res_content: I must recur to the great subject of food.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: I must recur to the great subject of food.

auth_sentence.content: These infections also have a tendency to recur.
auth_sentence.res_content: These infections also have a tendency to recur.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: These infections also have a tendency to recur.

auth_sentence.content: This chronic pattern may recur for many years.
auth_sentence.res_content: This chronic pattern may recur for many years.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: This chronic pattern may recur for many years.

stems_affixes.type_exp: 1. =run,表示"跑,发生,快速做……"; 2. =care,表示"关心"

stems_affixes.value_cn: 正确无误的;准确的,精确的
stems_affixes.word_buile: ac再+cur关心+ate……的→再关心,弄精确为止

stems_affixes.value_cn: 好奇的, 求知的, 古怪的, 爱挑剔的

stems_affixes.word_buile: accurate[[adj.正确无误的;准确的,精确的]]→n.准确[性];精确;准确度
cur关心+io→珍贵的被人多加关心的东西
cur关心+iosity多……的状态→关心多→好奇心
con共同+cur跑,发生,快速做……→共同跑→共同发生
in进入+cur跑,发生,快速做……→跑进来→招惹

stems_affixes.value_cn: 发生,出现;存在;想起,想到
stems_affixes.word_buile: oc向+cur跑,发生,快速做……→某个方向跑,发生

stems_affixes.value_cn: [尤指不好的事]一再发生;重现
stems_affixes.word_buile: re再次+cur跑,发生,快速做……→再次跑来

Sentence.sentence: A recurring criticism of the UK's university sector is its perceived weakness in translating new knowledge into new products and services.

means.word_mean: 再发生; 复发;反复出现

sentences.cn: 经济危机周期性地发生。

jushi.english: If the pain recurs, take this medicine.
Certain fevers recur at regular intervals.
jushi.chinese: 有些发烧症状会周期性反复出现。

jushi.english: Leap year recurs every four years.
